meanings.sent1: The touching story made me cry.
meanings.sent2: The movie's touching ending left everyone in tears.
meanings.sent3: The touching reunion of the long-lost siblings brought smiles to everyone's faces.
meanings.sent4: Her touching words of encouragement were like a warm hug to my soul.
meanings.sent5: The touching melody of the song lingered in my heart long after it ended.

meanings.definition: V. To make physical contact with something
meanings.sent1: I hesitated before touching the hot stove.
meanings.sent2: She gently touched the delicate flower petals.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten kept touching the buttons on the remote control.
meanings.sent4: His words touched my heart more deeply than any physical gesture could.
meanings.sent5: The artist's brush delicately touched the canvas, creating a masterpiece before our eyes.
